name: Grappling hook Physics Demo
description:
This is a Grappling hook test written in python by me.

I'm just doing some tests on grappling hook physics. But before I do some further  development, I thought I could release a demo for others to play to test this idea out. Please do give some feedbacks.

Controls:

WASD keys - Player movements

Space key / left mouse click - Use the hook.
